SELECT day, COUNT(uid) as uid, SUM(agentTime) as agentTime, SUM(payUserCount) as payUserCount, round(SUM(payUserCount) / COUNT(t.uid),2) as payUserRate, round(SUM(userRechargeMoney),2) as userRechargeMoney, round(SUM(userExchangeMoney),2) as userExchangeMoney, round(SUM(userRechargeMoney) / COUNT(uid),2) as addArpu, round(SUM(userSumBet),2) as userSumBet, round(SUM(userReward),2) as userReward, round(SUM(userSumBet) - SUM(userReward),2) as consumption from ( SELECT FROM_UNIXTIME(dr.time, '%Y-%m-%d') as day, COUNT(u.phone) as agentTime, dr.uid as uid, ( SELECT COUNT(distinct uid) from config_recharge_order cro where cro.recharge_amount > 0 and cro.uid <> 0 and dr.uid = cro.uid and FROM_UNIXTIME(dr.time, '%Y-%m-%d') = date_format(cro.finish_time, '%Y-%m-%d') ) as payUserCount, ( SELECT SUM(cro.recharge_amount) from config_recharge_order cro where dr.uid = cro.uid and FROM_UNIXTIME(dr.time, '%Y-%m-%d') = date_format(cro.finish_time, '%Y-%m-%d') and (cro.operate_type <> '3' and cro.operate_type <> '4' or cro.operate_type is null) ) as userRechargeMoney, ( SELECT SUM(ceo.withdraw_money) from config_exchange_order ceo where dr.uid = ceo.uid and FROM_UNIXTIME(dr.time, '%Y-%m-%d') = date_format(ceo.update_time, '%Y-%m-%d') and ceo.exaa_status = '5' ) as userExchangeMoney, ( SELECT SUM(dw.value) from data_water dw where dr.uid = dw.uid and FROM_UNIXTIME(dr.time, '%Y-%m-%d') = FROM_UNIXTIME(dw.time, '%Y-%m-%d') ) as userSumBet, ( SELECT SUM(dw.reward) from data_water dw where dr.uid = dw.uid and FROM_UNIXTIME(dr.time, '%Y-%m-%d') = FROM_UNIXTIME(dw.time, '%Y-%m-%d') ) as userReward from data_register dr left join data_user u on (dr.account_id = u.account_id) where 1=1
and dr.channel = #{channel}
and dr. channel IN ( SELECT t.t_id FROM sys_tenant t WHERE t.t_type = '2' AND (t.ancestors LIKE concat('%', #{tid2}, '%') OR t_id = #{tid2}) )
and dr.channel IN (SELECT t_id FROM sys_tenant WHERE tenant = #{tid} AND t_type = '2')
and FROM_UNIXTIME(dr.time, '%Y-%m-%d') >= #{createTime1} and FROM_UNIXTIME(dr.time, '%Y-%m-%d') <= #{createTime2} group by FROM_UNIXTIME(dr.time, '%Y-%m-%d'), dr.uid ) t group by day order by day DESC
select dr.uid as uid from data_register dr where #{day} = FROM_UNIXTIME(dr.time, '%Y-%m-%d')
